title: Retrospect of a long life from 1815 to 1883.
author: Hall, S. C.
snippet: He was the son of the Rev. Wyndham Lewis, of Newhouse,  Glamorganshire, and was called to the bar at Lincoln's Inn, November 23, 1819.

snippet: When the late Mr Charles Cunningham,1 farmer,Newhouse, was married to Miss Henderson, daughter of John Henderson, farmer in Langhope, myfather, as parish minister, tied the knot.
